extension_name.description: The name of the extension. Better if not changed.

extension_description.message: The browser extension every iTIC student should have!

done.description: Used as an OK to window prompts.

close.description: Used as a message to exit PopUps.

replace_html_view.description: Button that lets users view a file in the browser instead of downloading it.

replace_html_download_subject.description: Button that lets users download all the files from a subject.

progress_popup_title.description: This will appear on screen during the subject download as the TITLE.

progress_popup_fetching.description: This will appear on-screen during the subject download as the subtitle.

progress_popup_compressing.description: This will appear on-screen during the subject download as the subtitle.

success_downloading_subject.message: The subject $SUBJECT$ has been downloaded successfully.
success_downloading_subject.description: Message shown when a subject download is completed.

error_downloading_subject.description: Message shown when an error occurs when downloading a subject.

error_subject_empty.message: This subject has no files to download!
error_subject_empty.description: Message shown when the subject that we want to download is empty.

log_done_replace_html.description: Not important to translate (end user should never see this).

log_download_start.description: Not important to translate (end user should never see this).

log_download_tree.description: Not important to translate (end user should never see this).

log_saving_zip.description: Not important to translate (end user should never see this).
